title: Object - Stock Class Authorized Shares Adjustment Transaction
description: Records a change in the authorized shares for a stock class, specifying the new authorized share amount and referencing the stock class affected.

new_shares_authorized.description: The new number of shares authorized for this stock class as of the event of this transaction

board_approval_date.description: Date on which the board approved the change to the stock class

stockholder_approval_date.description: This optional field tracks when the stockholders approved the change to the stock class.
